mapper.select: select `gf_post`.* from `gf_post` left join `gf_post__gf_post_classify` on `gf_post`.id = `gf_post__gf_post_classify`.pid left join `gf_post_classify` on `gf_post_classify`.id = `gf_post__gf_post_classify`.classify_id where `gf_post_classify`.classify = #{classify} and `gf_post`.status = 1

select `gf_post`.* from `gf_post` left join `gf_post__gf_post_tag` on `gf_post`.id = `gf_post__gf_post_tag`.pid left join `gf_post_tag` on `gf_post_tag`.id = `gf_post__gf_post_tag`.tag_id where `gf_post_tag`.tag = #{tag} and `gf_post`.status = 1
